entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
